author: Igor Derysh
title: Meet the scariest Republican candidates of 2022: It wasn't easy to pick 'em

sentence: Perdue faces incumbent Brian Kemp, who has drawn criticism from Trump for Kemp's refusal to overturn the state's 2020 presidential election results.
author: Margaret Newkirk
title: Atlanta's New Mayor Dickens Seeks to Bring Unity to City Riven by Conflict

author: Igor Derysh
title: Meet the scariest Republican candidates of 2022: It wasn't easy to pick 'em

sentence: Combine that with high levels of energy and anger in the party base, and it's a recipe to remake the party from the ground up.? One of those primaries: the Georgia gubernatorial race, where DAVID PERDUE's Trump-backed effort to oust BRIAN KEMP has been a big flop,? report CNN's Michael Warren and Gabby Orr.
title: Operation Stop Greitens' goes awry
